detail_desc: 5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with visible seams at the front and slits at the hems.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back.
Metal studs in various sizes and designs decorated with glass rhinestones.

Sleeveless, ankle-length kaftan in a softly draping viscose weave with embroidery. V-neck and a slope down the shoulders for a draped effect that continues down the sides at both the front and back. Panels sewn into the sides for added width, and a tie belt at the waist.
Nylon jacket with a zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and one inner pocket. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Fine-knit lining.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Short-sleeved top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trenchcoat woven in a modal blend with notch lapels, shoulder tabs with decorative buttons, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a seam at the waist and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with lightly padded, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a lace hem. No fasteners.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a belt at the waist and a rounded hem.
Warm-lined hat in woven fabric with ears at the top, earflaps and a strap with a hook and loop fastening under the chin. Soft faux fur lining.
Short, fitted dress in glittery jersey with short sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the front and back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Soft bootees in pile with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Wide, ribbed top with a supersoft brushed finish. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ties at the hem.
Fitted lace dress with a V-neck front and back, lace cap sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined at the front and lined skirt.
Long metal earrings with round plastic pendants covered in fabric and beads. Length 10 cm.
Stretch leggings with an elasticated waist.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.

Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired lace bra with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill. Classic fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Top in jersey with a small, draped stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short cap sleeves and a straight hem. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Front and back pockets and tapered legs.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend containing glittery threads with scalloped tops.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a wide, foldover hem.
Ankle-length, bell-shaped skirt in woven fabric. High waist with buttons, and buttons and a slit at the front. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in washed stretch twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey. Slightly longer at the back.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Leggings in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides of the legs.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and zipped side pockets. Reflective details and tapered legs with a zip at the hems.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Leotard in patterned, glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
Earrings in metal decorated with glass sparkly stones. Length 3 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in cotton corduroy with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and beaded appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline.
Ankle-length trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Short skirt in woven fabric with decorative seams. Zip at the back. Lined.
Long sparkly stone earrings. Length approx. 12.5 cm.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Lined at the top of the front.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with jersey-lined, opening cups with removable inserts. Adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the leg, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems.

Blouse in chiffon with a round neckline with a lace-embroidered trim and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with smocking over the wrists. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved jersey top.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with decorative zips and seams on the legs. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and a zip fly and button. Extra-slim fit.
Boxy-style top in jersey with short, wide sleeves and an elasticated, drawstring hem.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.

Striped wrap dress in an airy, organic cotton weave with a V-neck, fabric strap with a plastic fastener on one side, long, wide sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Denim shorts in soft, airy cotton denim with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a fake fly.

Textile marker that allows you to decorate your fabric odds and ends and give them a unique and personal design. Add some style to your canvas trainers, fabric bag or T-shirt. Available in several colours. How to use: 1. Let the marker do the work and allow your creativity to flow. 2. Leave the ink to set for at least 24 hours so that it is totally fixed and wash-proof. 3. Can’t wait for 24 hours? Iron it.
V-neck knitted jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Loafers with pointed toes. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated fine knit containing glittery threads with elasticated ribbing at the waist. Unlined.
Wool scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x185 cm.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey. Adjustable press-stud fastenings on the shoulders, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless top in a soft knit with a V-neck front and back and a roll-edge hem.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in nylon with a metal buckle. Width of strap 2 cm, total length 24.5 cm. Diameter of watch 3.5 cm.
